description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Senior Account Supervisor/Account Manager will be responsible for successfully lead team to run and manage the projects on day to day basic to deliver project quality, good profit and client satisfaction.
              

              Key responsibilities
              
              -	Handle assigned accounts & projects
              
              -	Liaise with clients to discuss and identify their requirements
              
              -	Present campaign ideas and budget to clients
              
              -	Work with internal to deliver a campaign that meets the client's requirements, budget & time line.
              
              -	Be responsible for day-to-day client servicing of assigned accounts & projects
              
              -	Independently manages assigned projects & ensures the inter-departmental job flow.
              
              -	Negotiate with clients, solve problem and make sure deadlines are met
              
              -	Be capable to support team to solve issues, problems during execution
              
              -	Check and report on the campaign's progress
              
              -	Keep in touch with clients at all stages of campaigns
              
              -	Monitor the effectiveness of campaigns
              
              -	Handle budgets, manage campaign costs
              
              -	Take care client, maintain a strong business relationship with them and maximize to get all project of client.
              
              -	Coach and develop staff in line (account executive) with their career roadmap.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Qualifications
              
              -	Bachelor Degree required
              
              -	At least 3-5 years of working experience at Event Agency
              
              -	Excellent verbal and written communication skills, including ability to effectively communicate with internal and external customers
              
              -	Excellent computer proficiency (MS Office – Word, Excel, Power Point and Outlook)
              
              -	Good communication, negotiation skills
              

              The Personality
              
              -	Good communication, negotiation skills
              
              -	Must be able to work under pressure and tight deadlines, while maintaining a positive attitude and providing exemplary customer service
              
              -	Ability to work independently and to carry out assignments to completion within parameters of instructions given, prescribed routines, and standard accepted practices
              
              -	Experience in execution
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
